Class LBFGSTest

java.lang.Object
numerical.lbfgs.LBFGSTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
LBFGSFunction
public class LBFGSTest extends Object implements LBFGSFunction

Title: LBFGSTest

Example use of the LBFGS.lbfgs function. Run the main to execute.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2008

Company: Sandia National Laboratories

Author: Jim Hipp
